heisigStory: You may play with the primitives of this kanji as you wish (ceiling . . . person . . . a drop of), but you will probably find that its simplicity, and its frequency, make it easy to remember just as it is.
koohiiStory1: [Smithsonian] Scene: Mr. T hanging from the ceiling being tortured. He is asked if he is going to talk. Spitting (a drop of saliva) in the torturer´s face, he says "Negative".
koohiiStory2: One below zero is a negative number.
readingExamples: 不当 (ふとう), 不利 (ふり), 不賛成 (ふさんせい)
